explanation: This project creates a fully responsive landing page for 'BrownCo' using React and Tailwind CSS. The layout includes a hero section, features section, about section, testimonials/pricing section, and a footer/contact section. The color scheme is based on rich brown, pure white, and jet black to create a warm, modern, and high-end feel.
